snippet.title: Never Give Up Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
When the going gets tough, the tough don't quit! 
https://armorgamesstudios.com/games/never-give-up/

From the creators of the brutal and beloved Flash series enjoyed by millions of players worldwide comes the latest installment of hardcore, twitch-based platforming.

Every time you beat a level, another element is layered in to make it even harder. Buzzsaws? Guided missiles? Giant rhino mechs? Never Give Up has all that and more with over 250 stages, huge boss battles, a level editor, and full voice acting by none other than Egoraptor.
